line_1: Pigs squeak, fowls scream, and green geese flutter.
line_2: The cook-maid raves for want of butter,

line_1: And that to towze such Things as flutter,
line_2: To honest Bounce is Bread and Butter.
The Don, a formal, solemn strutter,

line_1: And maps lay all in flutter;
line_2: And a kingdom — bread and butter.
